data.name: Foretales Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Discover the enchanting soundtrack of Foretales composed by Christophe Héral and Raphaël Joffres.

The original soundtrack is made of 14 tracks that will take you in a trip through the regions of the Harde republic.
data.about_the_game:
Discover the enchanting soundtrack of Foretales composed by Christophe Héral and Raphaël Joffres.

The original soundtrack is made of 14 tracks that will take you in a trip through the regions of the Harde republic.
